node.headline: The way wey dey trusted pass to see, keep and change your tokens
You fit change your money for another one, anywia, anytime

childMarkdownRemark.html: Change your tokens direct for the MetaMask browser thing wey you install for your computer, the app for your phone, and for MetaMask Portfolio. De Swaps ting dey combine info from people wey dey connect decentralized markets, people wey dey make market, and DEXs, to make sure you get good prices with di smallest network fees.

node.headline: Why You Go Swap For MetaMask?

embed.embed: <iframe width="830" height="466" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/-z-SJV4ugHU?&rel=0&sub_confirmation=1" title="YouTube video player" frameborder="0" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; clipboard-write; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

modules.title: MetaMask Swap don land for Phone and Computer
Explanation on how e dey work

childMarkdownRemark.html: Unlike other crypto wallets wey dey out there, MetaMask dey designed to put your privacy first. We dey give you power to reach, keep and swap tokens, without any wahala for those dapps and exchanges wey wan collect more personal information pass wetin you agree to give them. Weda you dey participate for finance wey nor get one boss, or dey surf Web 3.0, with MetaMask, you dey always get complete control of your info.

modules.title: Area wey dey show how easy to buy or sell something

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Get better prices from
di best places wey dey provide plenty liquidity.

modules.title: Part wey dey talk about how easy e be to change am to cash for right side of page
Sign wey dey show how easy to buy or sell something

childMarkdownRemark.html: Review our official contracts wey them check

Swaps dey make sure say you see plenty different tokens and better prices, e go find price from many different markets and people wey dey sell them for one place. Dem add service charge of 0.875% to each quote, wey go help improve MetaMask for better, make am more sweet.

If you wan swap big amount, price fit change sharp sharp if dey no get enough money for dat particular place wey dey do swap (DEX). When you dey exchange something for MetaMask, e dey share your order for many many different platforms wey them dey exchange crypto (DEXs), to make sure say di price wey you go buy am no go change too much.

We follow another way to get better deals. Every way wey you go take do the transaction go get different gas money wey e go cost. Swaps dey find better prices and check which place dey provide liquidity dey use less gas for every trade.

Wit Swaps, you no need give permission many times for each token, you only do am once and you go fit reach all the available money for trading for DeFi; this way, e go take small time and less money for gas.
